body: I can't get Rhino 6 to work with the sunpath tool. I followed the thread here: [http://www.grasshopper3d.com/forum/topics/hb-and-lb-on-rhino-6-gh-1...](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/forum/topics/hb-and-lb-on-rhino-6-gh-1?groupUrl=ladybug&groupId=2985220%3AGroup%3A658987&id=2985220%3ATopic%3A1608402&page=1#comments) and still couldn't get mine to work. I cannot figure out how to get grasshopper to run Ironpython 2.7.7, if that is indeed the fix. I have changed the search directory in the python editor and uninstalled ironpython from the control panel. Both of those things area beyond my scope of knowledge, and I may have messed them up.  Error info below: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/jd6gI2obRb68pUYvUkB8FqSIPeZC-ng3k3oHqTOpxLNuzdcn-bh6VOBO2fn2BnRZ4sQ-jl87MSFGwAY5SjC1jII2bKZa2C9B/Capture.PNG)
topic: Another issue with LB and Rhino WIP
